content.raw:
I added run_gzclient (it just calls gzclient, no args, which I think is correct), 8917c04.

I'm inclined against adding more complexity to these scripts.  They should be used specifically to bring up the DRC Simulator, which is a narrower use case than the necessarily generic gazebo launching script that ROS has.  I think that it's OK to only be able to change the .world file that's being used.  And, in any case, we can always extend them later if the need arises.
